title: MED EYE
main_heading: Predicting Eye Diseases with Cutting-edge Machine Learning Models
main_subheading: Early detection made easier with advanced AI algorithms
statistic: of cases could have been treated if detected early.
about_description: We are a team of second year students of Institut National des Postes et Telecommunications, passionate about AI, ML and software engineering
faq_contact_prompt: Didn’t find the answer you are looking for?
faq_question3: Is MedEye a replacement for professional medical advice?
faq_question4: Is my data safe with MedEye?
faq_answer1: MedEye is an advanced platform that uses machine learning algorithms to provide predictions for potential eye diseases based on the information or images provided .
faq_answer2: MedEye boasts a high accuracy rate due to its sophisticated algorithms. While our platform provides valuable insights, it's essential to consult with a healthcare professional for a definitive diagnosis.
faq_answer3: No. MedEye is a supplementary tool designed to provide preliminary insights. Always seek the advice of a qualified healthcare professional regarding any medical concerns.
faq_answer4: Absolutely. We prioritize user privacy and data security. All images and data you provide are encrypted and stored securely, and we never share them with third parties without explicit consent.
sign_up_description: Begin by creating an account using a valid email address. If you're a returning user, simply log in.
upload_image_description: Use our user-friendly interface to upload a clear image of your eye.
ml_analysis_description: Our advanced machine learning algorithm gets to work. It processes the image, to identify patterns, abnormalities, or signs of potential eye diseases.
results_description: After the analysis, you'll receive a detailed report on our platform.
consultation_description: If any concerns are detected, we advise to consult with an ophthalmologist or optometrist for a comprehensive eye exam.
contact_prompt: If you have any question you can contact us by email
prediction_output: Based on the result of our Machine Learning Model the prediction for the Patient is to be
name: Name
patient_saved: Patient's Prediction saved successfully to the DataBase
